import React, { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; const AddUser = () => { let history = useHistory(); const [user, setUser] = useState({ name: "", age: "", address: "", gender: "", about: "", image: "" }); const { name, age, address, about, image } = user; const onInputChange = e => { setUser({ ...user, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const onSubmit = async e => { e.preventDefault(); await axios.post("http://localhost:3002/users", user); history.push("/"); }; return (
